title: Office Administrator
description: About EY:Â EY is a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction, and advisory services. The insights and quality services we deliver help build trust and confidence in the capital markets and in economies the world over. We develop outstanding leaders who team to deliver on our promises to all of our stakeholders. In so doing, we play a critical role in building a better working world for our people, for our clients, and for our communities.Job Summary:Â We are looking for a professional and friendly Office administrator to join our team at EY Latvia. This includes EY Tech MBA, EY Masters in Sustainability and Business Analytics, etc.Â International experience.Â Working in an international environment with projects, events & initiatives, as well as a bright and energetic team.Â Comprehensive compensation and benefits. Regular salary review, additional bonuses, paid days off for your studies & development, volunteering activities, and tenure-based leave.Additional health insurance that covers various medical services, and travel insurance.Â Transformative leadership.Â Well give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.Â Diverse and inclusive culture.Â Youll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.Â Â Salary:Â EUR 1400 1600 gross (Specific salary will depend on candidate experience, skills and the range might vary)Â The exceptional EY experience. Its yours to build.Â Â Apply now.Â Apply nowÂ Â Talent community

title: Experienced Consultant in Audit
description: At EY, youll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture, and technology to become the best version of you. And were counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.Â Â Your bold ambition is just the beginning!Â Join ourÂ Assurance teamÂ Â be an innovator and a problem solver, helping a complex world to work better by maintaining the confidence and trust that capital markets and society need.Â Â Â Â The opportunityÂ Working asÂ an AuditorÂ gives you unique, varied and exciting work experiences. You will be a part of our Audit team and help our clients meet regulatory requirements by accurately reporting on financial statements and providing meaningful insights. Being an Auditor lets you interact with multiple organizations, across different industries, and across different countries, to gain unique insights into how business operates. You will will have unique opportunity to understand the factors driving business performance, assess challenges and apply critical thinking.Â Â Â Your key responsibilitiesÂ Demonstrate an understanding of the audit clients business;Interact with the clients in order to collect all the necessary data/information, set up and maintain audit files, prepare leads, etc.;Support the planning, execution and delivery of audit engagements;Clearly and accurately document the execution of audit procedures as defined by the engagement objectives, audit client's engagement history, and planned audit approach;Other data and information analysis based on engagement needs.Â Â Attributes to thrive in the roleÂ At least 1 year of experience in external financial audit or relevant experience in AccountingUniversity degree or being last year student of economics/ finance/ accounting/ business/ other business-related subjects;Passionate about finance, attention to details, curiosity;Proper mix of strong communication and interpersonal skills as well as analytical and critical thinking skills;Motivation to continually develop personal & technical skills through training, experience and coaching;Excellent Latvian and English language skills;What we offerÂ Our promise to our people is an exceptional EY experience:Â Continuous learning & fast growth.Â Wide range of on- and off-the-job learning opportunities, and certification tailored to your individual career path. This includes EY Tech MBA, EY Masters in Sustainability and Business Analytics, etc.Â International experience.Â Working in an international environment with projects, events & initiatives, as well as a bright and energetic team.Â Comprehensive compensation and benefits. Regular salary review, additional bonuses, paid days off for your studies & development, volunteering activities, and tenure-based leave. Additional health insurance that covers various medical services, and travel insurance.Â Flexibility & wellbeing.Â Well provide the tools, support, and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, in your own way a hybrid work model, flexible working hours, and part-time options.Â Transformative leadership.Â Well give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.Â Diverse and inclusive culture.Â You'll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.Â Â Salary:Â EUR 1500 - 1700 gross.The exceptional EY experience. Its yours to build.Â Â About EYÂ EY is a global leader in the professional services market. Our services assurance, tax, consulting, strategy and transactions services help solve our clients toughest challenges and build a better working world for our people, for our clients, and for our communities. Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries all over the world help clients grow, transform, and operate.Â Â We consider our people as the heart of EY; we hire and develop the most passionate people in their field to build a better working world. At EY, we dont just focus on who you are now, but who you can become. Were redefining the traditional career experience and developing transformative leaders the kind the world needs. We empower our people with the right mindsets and skills to navigate whats next, pursue careers as unique as they are, and build their own exceptional EY experience.Â Â Â Your bold ambition is just the beginning!

title: IT Project Manger / Product Owner
description: DelfinGroupÂ is a Latvian fintech company offering accessible, straightforward, and customer-oriented financial and circular economy services. We create added value by integrating financial and circular retail services, making them easily accessible both in person and online.Mission for the Role:Own and lead cross-functional technology initiatives that connect business needs with smart, scalable solutions. Serve as the central bridge between business, tech, and users shaping roadmaps, writing specs, aligning teams, and delivering impactful software projects that move the business forward.You will turn ambiguous challenges into clear plans and real results, ensuring development efforts are focused on the right problems and executed with clarity, pace, and purpose.Outcomes:Own and lead end-to-end IT and software projects from initial problem discovery to solution delivery ensuring outcomes are aligned with business priorities and customer needs.Collaborate proactively with cross-functional teams to define, scope, and prioritize initiatives based on impact, feasibility, and strategic importance.Translate business challenges into clear, structured roadmaps, milestones, and structured release plans that balance short-term results with long-term value.Write clear, technical project specifications and user stories that are actionable, understandable, and ready for development without ambiguity.Work closely with development teams to facilitate accurate estimations, effective sprint planning, and smooth execution of software delivery.Track and measure project success through well-defined metrics and KPIs, ensuring efforts are directed at solving the right problems and delivering tangible value.Actively monitor project progress, identify risks and roadblocks early, and adjust plans with agility to maintain momentum and drive continuous improvement.Foster a culture of bold questioning and assumption-challenging, encouraging experimentation and rapid learning throughout the project lifecycle.Act as the critical communication bridge between business and technical stakeholders, ensuring alignment, engagement, and transparency across all phases of project delivery.Maintain a strong focus on problem-solving and customer impact, ensuring that development resources are prioritized toward initiatives that deliver measurable improvements.Competencies |Â What the Right Person Will Look Like:End-to-End Product OwnershipÂ Independently leads the full lifecycle of software products from discovery, opportunity validation, and problem definition through to solution delivery, testing, and iteration taking full responsibility for business and user outcomes, not just project completion.Technical FluencyÂ Produces clear, detailed, and structured project specifications and user stories that enable efficient, high-quality development, ensuring alignment between business needs and technical execution. Works seamlessly with development teams to estimate effort, plan sprints, and deliver solutions, demonstrating sound judgment in assessing technical complexity, risk, and feasibility.Planning & PrioritizationÂ Crafts detailed roadmaps, milestone plans, and release schedules while juggling fast-changing priorities. Balances business needs, tech feasibility, and customer value.Collaborative ExecutionÂ Works closely with engineers, analysts, and designers to refine requirements and unblock delivery.Data-Driven Decision-Making: Defines, monitors, and interprets key performance metrics to inform initiative prioritization, identify opportunities for optimization, and ensure continuous improvement based on measurable outcomes.Clear CommunicationÂ Translates complex ideas and maintains consistent alignment between technical and business stakeholders through clear, proactive communication, ensuring that expectations are managed and objectives are met.Problem Solving Under PressureÂ Breaks down complex challenges into clear components, uncovers root causes, and designs practical, scalable solutions. Adapts fast and keeps momentum even when plans change.Continuous ImprovementÂ Embraces feedback, experiments with new approaches, and continuously adapts strategies based on outcomes to drive personal, team, and project growth.Fit | Cultural & Experience Match:You bring 3+ years of experience in IT project management, software product development, or software delivery roles, working hands-on with developers, testers, designers, and analysts in Agile setups.You are fluent with Jira, Asana, ClickUp, or similar tools, and well-versed in Agile, Scrum, and Kanban practices.You thrive in dynamic, high-ownership environments where speed, structure, and adaptability must coexist.You have a real interest in fintech, consumer lending, e-commerce, or related industries, and are motivated to build meaningful technology in these spaces.You are a problem-solver first you focus on solving the right problems, ask the right questions, and use data and metrics to guide your decisions.You understand UI/UX principles, user research methods, and know how to apply A/B testing and experimentation techniques to improve products.You quickly absorb technical concepts, communicate clearly across technical and non-technical teams, and bridge business needs with technical solutions.You use data insights not only to prioritize work but also to drive continuous product improvement and innovation.You plan and structure projects realistically, build clear roadmaps and milestones, and stay focused even when priorities shift.You embrace experimentation, learning, and iteration moving forward without waiting for perfect conditions.You show strong personal integrity, ownership, and accountability you consistently deliver on commitments and earn the trust of cross-functional teams.You are a high-energy, collaborative team player who thrives in fast-paced, results-driven environments.Compensation:We take an individual approach to each candidate, assessing their skills, experience, and contributions to the company while also considering personal goals and growth ambitions.The offered salary is startingÂ from EUR 3500/monthÂ with room for growth.We description: About Us at GoCardlessGoCardless is aÂ global bank paymentÂ company.
